verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: Back in Italy] [ARGM-TMP: on May 26 , 2017] , [ARG0: first lady Melania Trump] [V: posed] [ARGM-LOC: on the balcony] [ARGM-LOC: at Catania City Hall] [ARGM-ADV: with the spouses of other G7 summit leaders meeting in Taormina in Sicily] .

Back in Italy on May 26 , 2017 , first lady Melania Trump posed on the balcony at Catania City Hall with the spouses of [ARG0: other G7 summit leaders] [V: meeting] [ARGM-LOC: in Taormina in Sicily] .
